labels.analysis: The MCP Server "Coinranking" provides real-time and historical cryptocurrency data, market statistics, and exchange information. Its core functionality revolves around offering detailed insights into cryptocurrency markets, enabling users to make informed decisions through advanced search, coin comparisons, and market analysis. The available tools cover a wide range of features, from price tracking and historical data retrieval to trending coin identification and global market statistics. This server is particularly useful for applications requiring up-to-date crypto insights and analytics, with seamless API integration.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Cryptocurrency & Blockchain" was chosen because the server's primary functionality is centered around cryptocurrency data, market statistics, and exchange information. This encompasses trading, market analysis, and blockchain interaction, which are core aspects of this category. The secondary label "Data Analysis & Processing" is relevant due to the server's offerings of price history, global stats, and trending data, which support analytics. The secondary label "API Integration" was selected because the server simplifies integration with easy API key configuration and ready-to-use prompts. There is no need for a custom label as the predefined categories adequately cover the server's functionality.

tools.name: configure_api_key
tools.description: Configure your Coinranking API key for this session. Get your key at https://account.coinranking.com/dashboard

tools.name: list_coins
tools.description: Get cryptocurrencies with prices, market caps, 24h volume, change %, rank, sparklines, and links - includes market totals

limit.description: Number of coins to return (default: 50, max: 5000)

orderBy.description: Order results by: marketCap, price, listedAt, change, or circulatingSupply (default: marketCap)

orderDirection.description: Order direction: desc or asc (default: desc)

search.description: Search query for coin name or symbol

symbols.description: Comma-separated list of coin symbols to filter

tags.description: Comma-separated list of tags to filter (e.g., defi, stablecoin, nft)

uuids.description: Comma-separated list of coin UUIDs to filter

tools.name: get_coin
tools.description: Get comprehensive coin data: price, market cap, volume, supply details, all-time high, description, links, and social media

uuid.description: The UUID of the coin (e.g., 'Qwsogvtv82FCd' for Bitcoin)

tools.name: get_price_history
tools.description: Get timestamped price history for charting - returns price points and change % over time periods (1h to 5y)

tools.name: search
tools.description: Search for coins, exchanges, or markets

query.description: Search query for coins, exchanges, or markets

tools.name: get_global_stats
tools.description: Get global market overview: total market cap, 24h volume, total coins/exchanges, Bitcoin dominance, and market trends

tools.name: list_exchanges
tools.description: Get exchanges with 24h volume, number of markets, rank, market share % - requires Pro API key

orderDirection.description: Order direction: desc or asc (default: desc)

tools.name: get_reference_currencies
tools.description: Get currencies for displaying crypto prices - includes fiat (USD, EUR), cryptocurrencies (BTC, ETH), and denominators (Satoshi, Wei)

tools.name: get_categories
tools.description: Get cryptocurrency categories with market analytics - includes market cap, volume, performance metrics, and coin counts for categories like DeFi, AI Agents, Layer-1, Meme Coins, etc.

tools.name: get_trending_coins
tools.description: Get top 10 trending cryptocurrencies based on searches, social mentions, and market activity

tools.name: get_coin_price
tools.description: Get just the current price of a coin - lightweight alternative to get_coin for price-only queries

server_info_crawled.overview: Provide real-time and historical cryptocurrency data, market statistics, and exchange information to enhance your applications with up-to-date crypto insights. Enable advanced search and detailed coin comparisons to support informed decision-making. Simplify integration with easy API key configuration and ready-to-use prompts for market analysis.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@coinranking/coinranking-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
